Posts.Content: not to scare you ..but a lump isnt the only breast cancer symptom Early breast cancer usually does not cause pain. In fact, when breast cancer first develops, there may be no symptoms at all. But as the cancer grows, it can cause changes that women should watch for: A lump or thickening in or near the breast or in the underarm area. A change in the size or shape of the breast. A discharge from the nipple. A change in the color or feel of the skin of the breast, areola, or nipple (dimpled, puckered, or scaly). A woman should see her doctor if she notices any of these changes. Most often, they are not cancer, but only a doctor can tell for sure.
Posts.Title: sore on breast

Posts.Content: i would call the makers of lamisil ..you should be able to get that info off the box and ask them if it can be used elsewhere safely..but if it were me i wouldnt wait ..i would see a dermatologist right away...also you mite ask the dr if he thinks a mamogram is called for....
Posts.Title: sore on breast

Posts.Content: I DONT UNDERSTNAD YOUR DRS LINE OF THINKING.JUST BECAUSE THIS IS YOUR FIRST MAMMO DOESNT MEAN THAT IT IS NORMAL FOR YOU...IT COULD EASILY BE THAT IF YOU HAD A MAMMO LAST YEAR THE LUMP WOULD NOT HAVE BEEN THERE.....THERE ARE NORMALLY 2 KINDS OF MAMMOS..ONE IS A SCREENING ..I ASSUME THAT IS WHAT YOU HAD..IT HAS BEEN MY EXPERIENCE THAT IF THEY SEE ANYTHING QUESTIONABLE ON THE SCREENING MAMMO THEY CAN DO A DIAGNOSTIC MAMMO OR AN ULTRASOUND...THEN IF THERE SEE SOMETHING ITS TIME FOR THE NEEDLE BIOPSY..PLS REMEMBER YOU ARE ULTIMATELY IN CONTROL OF YOUR HEALTH CARE AND IT REALLY IS ADVISABLE TO FOLLOW UP ON THIS RATHER THAN WAIT 6 MONTHS....
Posts.Title: Just got results from first mammo - am a little scared... 1 2

Posts.Content: i have had several friends with breast cancer...when the initial lump is felt or seen on a mammo i have come to believe that it is the "party line" so to speak for the dr to tell the patient it looks feels whatever benign to him .....i believe it is a way of alleviating the patients fears til the final verdict is in..and is in no way a reflection of what the dr really thinks..as for your benign looking nodule..if it were truly normal to have these wouldnt your other breast have them as well..if they really felt it was of totally no concern..they would not have mentioned it to you at all..and you would have been scheduled in one year not 6 mos...i think the thing to remember is that in your original post you said they described it as a benign "looking" nodule...looking is not enough..they need to test it ..good luck
Posts.Title: Just got results from first mammo - am a little scared... 1 2

Posts.Content: i have a friend on tamoxifen..she has been on it for several months..yesterday she had 2 dizzy spells..is anyone else having similiar episodes?
Posts.Title: tamoxifen and dizziness

Posts.Content: why not seek a 3rd opinion.sort of a tie breaker..best of luck to you..barb
Posts.Title: lumpectomy vs. mastectomy?

Posts.Content: i want to know if anyone was on cholesterol lowering drugs when they started on tamoxifen. i want to know if the cholesterol lowering drug that had previously been working seemed to stop after a few months on the tamoxifen,allowing your total cholesterol and triglycerides to become elevated.. i have called astra zenaca the maker of tamoxifen and they tell me that they have had some reports of this happening since the drug has been on the market....but did not encounter it in the clinical trial.....if you are experiencing this pls cl astra zenaca at 800-942-0424 and report it..they only know if there is a side effect or problem if the users tell them..also pls let me know on this board
Posts.Title: tamoxifen and high cholesterol

Posts.Content: from what i have read on line infiltrating lobular cancer is fast growing. .ofcourse this may not be what your mother has....
Posts.Title: Rapidly Growing Breast Lump

Posts.Content: a friend has been on tamoxifen for about 3 yrears, after having a lumpectomy and radiation. she is now diagnosed with nodules on her thyroid and has to go for furhter testing. has any one else used tamoxifen and developed thryoid nodules? thank you
Posts.Title: tamoxifen and thyroid nodules

Posts.Content: i knew a woman who was very thin and very flat chested..she developed breast cancer....i am not saying there is any connection between the two ofcourse..and i dont know if her mammos showed dense as yours does..you mite want to ask your dr if he thinks that an ultrasound may be better for you....
